title: Panic Selling Grips Chinese Stocks in Biggest Plunge Since 2008 - Yahoo Finance
content: Panic Selling Grips Chinese Stocks in Biggest Plunge Since 2008  Yahoo Finance
description: (Bloomberg) -- Chinese stocks listed in Hong Kong had their worst day since the global financial crisis, as concerns over Beijing’s close relationship with Russia and renewed regulatory risks sparked panic selling.Most Read from BloombergUkraine Update: New Round of Talks; U.S-China Officials to MeetU.S. Journalist Killed in Ukraine in Shooting Near KyivMarcos Nears Bottom in Philippine Markets Poll Favoring RobredoU.S. Says Russia Sought China Military Aid for Ukraine WarSea’s Billionaire CEO O
